item.title: Forestry, a git-based CMS
item.description: So as those who have been following me may know, I keep just upgrading my blog while not really writing for it. The problem with writing for this blog is that, as much as I love VSCode, it’s not the most effective for blog post writing. So I have been shopping around for a CMS that’ll work with my existing blog because I do not want to migrate my blog again.
